job_tasks.justification: This phrase refers to the ongoing maintenance of the software application, which is a core software development task.
This implies setting up and managing operational processes for the application, aligning with operational aspects of software systems.

job_tasks.phrase: richt de onboarding volgens de Cloud standaarden van a.s.r. in
job_tasks.justification: This describes the setup of infrastructure and processes according to established cloud standards, which falls under operational management.

job_tasks.phrase: de applicatie onderhoud je door bugs te fixen en het verbeteren van de code
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions traditional software engineering activities such as bug fixing and code improvement as part of application maintenance.

job_tasks.phrase: alerting en monitoring in Application Insights
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the implementation of monitoring and alerting systems for the application, which is a key responsibility in operations and MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: je zorgt ervoor dat nieuwe gebruikers binnen a.s.r. worden aangesloten
job_tasks.justification: This task involves integrating new users into the system, which is a standard software integration activity.

job_tasks.phrase: bouwt interfaces voor nieuwe bronnen en consumerende systemen
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of interfaces and APIs for connecting with external systems, a core aspect of software integration.

job_tasks.phrase: ontwikkelt interfaces voor het aansluiten op het DataWareHouse en nieuwe features
job_tasks.justification: This involves developing interfaces for data integration (DataWareHouse) and new functionalities, which are traditional software development and integration tasks.

profile.rationale: The job title 'Speech Analytics' indicates that the application being worked on is related to AI-powered features. The described tasks are predominantly backend software development, maintenance, and integration (Macro-Category A). While there are no explicit tasks related to developing or fine-tuning AI/ML models, the role involves building and maintaining the software that supports an AI-powered system, fitting the definition of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement clearly outlines backend development and operational tasks. The classification as 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' is based on the reasonable inference that 'Speech Analytics' represents an AI-powered feature that the backend system supports, even though the specific AI/ML model development tasks are not detailed.
